Just to let people know this is great for your ipod or mp3 player.  Don't bother making a cd unless your car can use a data/mp3 disc.

One minor minor flaw, I have to mention is the chapters cut off, maybe a few sentences short.  Nothing major, nothing that detracts from the overall quality, just a minor thing that will throw you off the first time you hear it.
